sqls.sql: SELECT ea_check_item_h_id, ea_check_item_seq, ea_check_item_name, ea_check_type, ea_check_value_std, ea_check_value_min, ea_check_value_max, ea_check_cycle_day, ea_check_item_b_rmk1, ea_check_item_b_rmk2, ea_check_item_b_rmk3, ea_check_item_b_rmk4, ea_check_item_b_rmk5, ea_check_item_b_rmk6, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user, upd_user_no, upd_user_name, upd_host FROM ea_check_item_b WHERE ea_check_item_b_id = @ea_check_item_b_id;
